about_the_game:
Relegated below the surface of the ocean, humanity continues to survive and a stressed, yet thriving kingdom yearns to expand.

As part of an expedition team sent to charter a course through a dangerous and unexplored region of the ocean, you’ll come face-to-face with environmental dangers, curious creatures, and newly unleashed horrors from beneath the ocean floor.

Survive the dive, find the path, and discover secrets best left undiscovered.

GAMEPLAY

Burn Depth is an underwater horror exploration experience that will put you inside the cockpit of a slow, claustrophobic battery powered bathyscaphe tasked with taking readings and collecting samples of the local environment and denizens.

You’ll be equipped with a variety of instruments, each of which will grant you either greater awareness of your surroundings or safety, but each use will further drain your dwindling battery. Manage your resources lest you be stranded in the deep.

FEATURES

- Fully explore a variety of diverse hand crafted underwater areas
- Encounter dozens of originally designed creatures ranging from openly curious to overtly hostile
- Fully voiced NPCs and an original soundtrack
- A tense and uneasy atmosphere

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit or newer
  • Processor: 4th Generation Intel i3 CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: HD 4600/Geforce 620/Radeon 6450 or equivalent GPUs with 1 GB of video RAM

short_description: Burn Depth is an tense, underwater, horror exploration game. Find a path through a dangerous and unexplored area of the ocean filled with menacing creatures. Manage your vessel's resources, survive the dive, and uncover the mysteries beneath the sea floor.
